question: Why does this loop never end? while(true) { System.out.println("Hi"); }
explanation: The loop condition never becomes false, so it runs forever.

question: What is wrong? int x; System.out.print(x);
explanation: Local variables must be initialized before use.

question: Why does this crash? int[] a = new int[3]; System.out.print(a[3]);
Why does this throw NullPointerException? String s=null; s.length();
explanation: You cannot call methods on a null reference.
